sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_aw_form_uiaction_layout</collection> <condition>current.operation() == 'insert' || current.table.changes() || current.view.changes() || current.workspace.changes() || current.sys_domain.changes()</condition> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>table + workspace + view must unique</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous) { if (current.isActionAborted()) { return; } var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_aw_form_uiaction_layout'); gr.addQuery('table', current.table); if (gs.nil(current.view)) gr.addNullQuery('view'); else gr.addQuery('view', current.view); if (gs.nil(current.workspace)) gr.addNullQuery('workspace'); else gr.addQuery('workspace', current.workspace); if (gs.nil(current.sys_domain)) gr.addNullQuery('sys_domain'); else gr.addQuery('sys_domain', current.sys_domain); gr.queryNoDomain(); if (gr.getRowCount() > 0) { gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("UI Action layout already exists for this domain, table, workspace, view combination.")); current.setAbortAction(true); } })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-02-03 19:20:46</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>10df5df4c7320010cff9337bf4c26041</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>table + workspace + view must unique</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Agent Workspace - Form" source="com.snc.agent_workspace.form">b7ea78203c35311068bcf327dfe37f54</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_10df5df4c7320010cff9337bf4c26041</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-02-06 19:49:31</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=10df5df4c7320010cff9337bf4c26041"/> </record_update>
